content: I don't have access to the personal feelings of locals, but in general, the local community in montreux is aware of the challenges associated with the town's proximity to lake geneva. many locals have raised concerns about the potential risks of flooding and environmental impact on the lake. however, they also acknowledge that the beautiful waterfront location is a significant draw for tourism and brings economic benefits to the town. some locals may also have different opinions, depending on their personal experiences with these issues or how much they are involved in the development and economic aspects of the town. overall, there is likely to be a mix of opinions and perspectives among the local community.
